00156 struct TupleId {
00158     PageId page;
00160     SlotId slot;
00161 
00163     TupleId() : page(0), slot(0) { }
00164 
00166     inline bool operator==(TupleId const &other) const
00167           { return page == other.page && slot == other.slot; }
00168 
00170     inline bool operator!=(TupleId const &other) const
00171           { return !this->operator==(other); }
00172 
00174     TupleId &operator=(TupleId const &other)
00175           {
00176               page = other.page; slot = other.slot;
00177               return *this;
00178           }
00179 };
